content.query:
CREATE TABLE cleaned_retail_data (
    invoice_no NVARCHAR(100),
    stock_code NVARCHAR(100),
    description NVARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    invoice_date DATETIME,
    unit_price FLOAT,
    customer_id INT,
    country NVARCHAR(100),
    total_price FLOAT,
    transaction_id NVARCHAR(100),
    invoice_year INT,
    invoice_month INT,
    invoice_dayof_week NVARCHAR(100)
)
WITH(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN
);



SELECT * FROM cleaned_retail_data
